actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: To amend title I of the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 to provide church pension plans the opportunity to offer automatic enrollment into the plans, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends title I of the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 to allow for automatic enrollment into church pension plans.

titles.title: To amend title I of the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 to provide church pension plans the opportunity to offer automatic enrollment into the plans, and for other purposes.
